thread.title: Rhine River cruise ship collided with freighter in Duesseldorf, Germany
thread.title_full: Rhine River cruise ship collided with freighter in Duesseldorf, Germany

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Rhine River cruise ship collided with freighter in Duesseldorf, Germany
text:
Rhine River cruise ship collided with freighter in Duesseldorf, Germany   
Aug 17, 2015 eTN   
Cruises between Duesseldorf, Cologne and the beautiful wine area are prime tours for tourists visiting the River Rhine in Germany. Specially now with temperatures reaching 38 C a tour on the river is under high demand. 
Today at a passenger cruise liner collided with a freighter ship in the German city of Duesseldorf 
Two passengers on the cruise ship suffered injuries. 
Duesseldorf is the capital of the German State of Northrhine Westphalia and the beautiful old town is a major stop for anyone touring the River Rhine. 
Duesseldorf fire department officials managed to separate the vessels and are currently investigating the incident.
